item.description:
We are the only studio on New Hampshire that offers Principle-Based Partner Yoga.

For those of you wanting to add value to your existing practice, we include principles such as Compassion, Trust, Surrender, Union, Touch, Grounding, Creativity Balance, and Silence.

These tools are necessary towards building your confidence in dealing with others. We understand that ultimately we are all one and in doing these practices we have more knowledge of others in the movement and silence with one another.

This unique method should not be discredited. It is a unique offering to the community and one of its kind. The opportunity to truly share a practice with a stranger, friend or lover, lends to a fantastic energetic experience. It creates a balance and camaraderie between two humans exsisting in the same space having had different life experiences. We bridge this gap by joining in a similar experience for an hour. This will transform what you have been doing for individual practices and classes.

Partner Yoga allows one to get deeper and more involved in a posture. This class is great for anyone wanting to take their practice to a level of compassion, understanding of human trust and support.

* Partner work involves mirroring of postures (Mats facing eachother doing Sun Salutations and postures), or opposite postures (one person does a forward bend, while the other does back bend). This will involve more intense work than what you are used but will have the restorative feel including more stretching, stability and support.
item.name: Partner Yoga
